name: Confined Bullet Hell
description:
This is for the Bullet Hell 2022 Jam: https://itch.io/jam/bullet-hell-jam-2022

IF THE EXE DOES NOT WORK, OPEN THE HTML CALLED "game" IN THE "Stuff" FOLDER

PRESS "Run Anyway" IF IT INFORMS YOU THAT "Windows Protected Your PC" I AM 100% SURE IT IS NOT A VIRUS

In this game, you dodge projectiles from other things, kinda simple. 

Level music was made by this guy: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7M2GktXPdKi27Csjp0Yfyw

Kinda similer to "Just Shapes and Beats" but thats just because I lack creativity

YT Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsNhjJPFf5Lf2XJV-zZALsg
